name: Fissure
desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

name: Mystic Flare
desc: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Echo Slam
desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.

name: Light Strike Array
desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

name: Shadow Strike
desc: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

name: Chronosphere
desc: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Blink Strike
desc: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

name: Dragon Tail
desc: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

name: Chaos Strike
desc: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage, also causing the critical strike to lifesteal for 75% of the damage.

name: Aphotic Shield
desc: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
